channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- CNCSoft with ScreenEditor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- CNCSoft with ScreenEditor

item.title: CVE-2018-10598|2024-08-05T07:39:08.522Z -- ics-cert -- cncsoft%20with%20screeneditor
item.description: CNCSoft Version 1.00.83 and prior with ScreenEditor Version 1.00.54 has two out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities could cause the software to crash due to lacking user input validation for processing project files. Which may allow an attacker to gain remote code execution with administrator privileges if exploited.

item.title: CVE-2018-10636|2024-08-05T07:46:46.130Z -- ics-cert -- cncsoft%20with%20screeneditor
item.description: CNCSoft Version 1.00.83 and prior with ScreenEditor Version 1.00.54 has multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities that could cause the software to crash due to lacking user input validation before copying data from project files onto the stack. Which may allow an attacker to gain remote code execution with administrator privileges if exploited.
